were bigger" you thought. Well today is your lucky day!

You had just finished crafting it, and couldn't think of a better test subject.

But should you tell Ms. Vivian? Or give her an early birthday surprise?

without hesitation she says
111.title: The gentleman's way

" Of course Davey! I'd love to! "
shocked you say nothing.

fantasies can come true!
Smiling you ready the ray. " you ready Ms. V?"

there's only one way to reply to that! You fire the ray at her, then watch
in awe as it works!!!!
Slowly but surely Vivian was growing.
But how much?

11111.content:
so it worked! Ms. V was growing, and you couldn't be happier.
you decide to stop for now and check her progress.

" wow... Ms. V, it worked!!!!! "

" Oh Davey, i know it did ", she replies with a smile.

You both stand up to see that her amazing bikini clad body now stands
as tall as yours!

just when it couldn't get any better, Ashley walks out.

" Mom! what the hell happened?!?! "

" That's obvious honey, i grew! "

" But.... how? "

Ashley looks over and sees the ray in your hand.
A somewhat devious smile crosses her face...

Now what to do....
11111.title: even playing field

choices: Grow her to 20 feet tall...for starters.
What do you think? Smaller? No, BIGGER!
111111.content:
Just as you begin to take aim at Vivian again, mind and body in perfect unison over such decision, you can't help but notice Ashley's devious smile turn into the hottest 'puppy dog eyes' you've seen in your life. This could only be topped if it was Vivian giving you that look. You attempt to pull the trigger to make her hot mom grow again...but somehow that look has sapped the entirety of your will. You lower the ray and turn your head to Ashley and ask her, "C-can I help you, Ashley? I'm a little busy growing your mom..." That didn't turn out sounding as right as it did in your head...

Ashley beams at you and says, "I like you. I always have..." While you admit, you've felt similarly about her to an agonizingly slightly lesser degree than Ms. V herself, usually a girl only says that when there's something they want. But you're beginning to piece together what it is she's after. She's eying your piece...your ray, that is. Though your...piece you're quite attached to is making itself very hard to ignore downstairs. And indeed, it's confirmed when she continues, "And I've always wanted to be bigger...and bigger... Why should my mom have all the growing fun?"

Vivian nods in approval at her daughter's comment, and then says to you, "She's really into the idea of becoming a giantess. I think it wouldn't hurt to oblige her, do you? Just don't count me out of the growing game yet!" Ashley smiles and responds, "Oh, mom... I wouldn't want to deny you that dream either! Why, I'd wrestle that ray out of David's hand if I had to to make sure you could get at least as big as I do."

The thought should terrorize you...but somehow it only serves to enthrall you. Having a giant Ashley wrestle you with her perfect body... (Vivian's is somewhere beyond perfect) You decide, why not? Two growing beauties can't possibly be worse than one! It can't be anything but better! "Very well then. You should move away from your house a bit so your foot doesn't accidentally go through it or something."

Ashely happily does as suggested, and then you take aim and fire at her. A teeny tap on the trigger would be enough to make her your height, since she's already at a nice 6'1"...but that hardly qualifies as giantess material. Not even mini-giantess! You hold down the trigger and watch as Ashley quickly meets and then exceeds your height. "Ooh...this growing feeling...Oh how it knows how to make a girl happy in all the right ways!" Soon she grows past 7 feet tall, and then 8 feet. 9 feet tall is waved goodbye as she climbs up to 10 feet and still growing as you decide whether to stop and aim at Vivian now or continue making Ashley even bigger. You estimate that if you stop now, she should reach about 20 feet before the energy peters out. What to do?

111112221.content:
"I think you've had enough fun with my mom. I'll take that!" Ashley says as she snatches the ray from your hands and walks in front of you. You're amazed both by how she was able to take your invention out of your hands despite your death-grip on its grip, (and especially the trigger) and just how utterly HOT Ms. Vivian's 16 year old daughter is. This is helped by the fact that Ashley is wearing a very skimpy bikini, not at all unlike her mom. You have told your best friend time and time again how both his sister and his mother are hotter than 5-alarm blazes, and you've always secretly liked Ashley. Not as much as Vivian herself, but really only if you absolutely had to pick one of the white-hot women.

However, at this moment, you're...a little afraid of what Ashley intends to do with the ray. Was she going to tinker with it to get a shrink option? Keep it from being used and leave her mom a piddly 75 feet tall? You're afraid to find out when she says with a devious smile, "Thank you, David. Now I have everything I need, all thanks to you!"

To your surprise though, she continues, "Yes, thanks to you, I have everything I need...to make all three of our fantasies come true, especially yours! You see, I know that you're into giantesses. And I've always dreamed of becoming one myself. And...well, do I really have to say anything about my mom?" A particularly loud, sensual moan from Vivian flatly denies any need. "Besides, you wouldn't want your big, strong arms to get tired from shooting little old me or my still little old mom, would you? Not when we could be soooo much BIGGER..."

Her glance down at your pants informed her quite well that you agree with that notion, at least a part of you does anyway. Not that any other part of you has any complaints. She smiles at your body's response and says, "I'll take that as you agree with me. Now, let me see...how do I operate this?" you tell her without thinking, "Just pull the trigger while aiming at a target. The dial on the side indicates its current power level. And it's power source should never run out, so it can make a target as big as its user wants." Ashley smiles even wider and says with admiration, "O-ooh! Big, strong, and smart... No wonder the ladies fawn over you...and mom and me especially!"

Your hard-on manages to do the impossible and becomes even harder. "You...you really mean that, Ashley?! I mean, I've always secretly liked you, but..." you say, and the hot teen nods, saying, "Mm-hm! Why do you think my mom was so eager to go along with this in the first place? I've always liked you, David. It thrills me to know you've always liked me too! I know, if you had to pick between us you'd go with my mom. Although who knows, in a couple years I could hope to have a body as hot as hers. She is my mom, of course, and my grandma...why, if she were alive today, you'd have a third hot woman in your sights. It runs in the family!

"Now, enough talking. We all know what you want to see. So let's get growing!" Ashley turns and points the ray at herself before squeezing the trigger. The moment the beam hit her right between her very generously sized breasts, she begins to moan...and grow. And grow. And GROW! She flies past 10 feet in no time, and 20 feet passes just as quickly. As she clears 30 feet, you notice that the ray was growing with her, which leads you to the possibilities that it can either grow or shrink to accommodate its user's hand's size; or the growth energy that's enveloping the now well past 50 feet tall Ashley is also affecting the ray itself. Either way, you're far too turned on to care which as Ashley grows to her mom's height of 75 feet tall and...

"Vivian, Ashley, I...have something to tell you. I -" you're cut off again, this time by Ashley as she says excitedly, "You...really like me? I know you think my mom is hot and all, pretty much every boy in school says so." Vivian chuckles and waves her hand as her face becomes flushed and she responds, "Oh ho ho ho s-stop... Besides, you're interrupting David, dear."

You blush at Ashley's outburst. You never suspected that she actually really liked you, too. You poke in Vivian's mind with your powers, and - WHOA! If that knowledge were to fall into the other guys at school...they'd be after you with razor-sharp pitchforks! But you pretend to have not read those thoughts as you say, "Well...y-yes, that too. You are easily, in my opinion, the second hottest thing to ever walk the Earth. Your mom is THE hottest, but it's very close. But I also wanted to tell you two that I...am basically omnipotent. And I would love to make you two grow...if, uh, that's okay with you..."

You feel your heart beat as the air becomes so tense you could cut it with a knife while you wait for their reaction. To your surprise, Vivian answers honestly, "Well I could always use to be a bit bigger...hehe, or a lot." Ashley adds, "You'd do that for us? Awesome... But, what about the neighborhood and stuff? I'd love to grow bigger, but not if it meant someone getting hurt in the process...Could you -"

This time, you cut her off by finishing what she was about to say. You had already been thinking it, after all. "Ensure that no one can be hurt by you two as you grow? Please. I can do better. Nothing and no one will hurt you nor can be hurt by you two as you grow or even when you stop. It's easier than trying to remember everything down to the finest detail to restore it myself, which even then may be distorted by how I remember it."

You also point out, "Oh yes, I'd like to mention that this is COMPLETELY voluntary. If at any point either or both of you wish to stop growing any further, that's fine by me. If either or both of you wish to return to your original size, just say the word and it'll be done. Believe me, having the scorn and hatred of the two most beautiful things I have ever laid eyes on in my entire life is NOT something on my want list. So, shall we get to the growing or what?"
